data.message: Eminem your first two albums changed my life. I was blasting the slim shady LP in the fourth grade when everyone else was listening to shitty pop. You are the reason I write rhymes and rap today. Ever since you came into my life, I've been writing raps. And I wouldn't have it any other way. I love you Marshall. More than you could ever imagine.

replies.message: Yea I caught on late to em 98-99. I wasn't tryin hear this white man rap (no offense) the statement on the radio he came with a different support group. I finally sat down to here slim shady bad meets evil...as the world turns was 🔥... I was hating but I glad I changed my mind 👏
ive been bumpin ems music since 97 love his music old new never gets old. im a huge fan. he has talent. being hot is just a bonus.
